definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: only Nu 21:1 ´[[דֶּרֶח הָא]]; so LXX, perh. (Di) name of a caravan-route, cf. 0’a3ara vestige, footprint; others (after Targum SyrVer) transl. way of the spies (cf. Nu 13:22); but [[הָאֲתָרִים]] for [[הַתָּרִים]] is highly improbable, and a locality would hardly receive its designation from the spies.
